selections.name: Maury Wills
selections.reason: Top Speed Figure (112) in the field. D'Amato/Ayuso combination is lethal on turf sprints. Shows the early speed required to clear from the outside post.

selections.name: Big Bill
selections.reason: Consistent turf performer with a 111 speed figure. Draws the rail which is advantageous if he breaks well.

selections.name: Just A Graze
selections.reason: Solid form with a 110 speed figure. Should sit a perfect stalking trip just off the pace.

selections.name: Omnificent
selections.reason: Speed figure of 104 puts him in the mix for exotics.

danger_horse.name: Big Bill
danger_horse.reason: Has the speed to challenge the top pick if the rail trip works out.

selections.name: Captain Sparrow
selections.reason: Significant class drop from AOC/CLM25k levels to $10k claiming. Speed figure of 108 is superior to this field. Glatt barn is 20%.

selections.name: Horizon Wildcat
selections.reason: Coming off a win and holds a competitive 106 speed figure. Kimura/Galvin team is dangerous.

selections.name: Broadway Unions
selections.reason: Highest last race speed figure (109). Consistent check earner at this level.

selections.name: Spiritist
selections.reason: Recent winner at lower level, stepping up but in good form.

danger_horse.name: Horizon Wildcat
danger_horse.reason: In winning form and fits the speed profile of the race.

selections.name: With Love (gb)
selections.reason: Major class relief dropping from Graded Stakes and AOC company to Claiming. Speed (107) and Class (103) figures top the field.

selections.name: Sakura Flavor (ire)
selections.reason: Possesses the highest raw speed figure (113). Dangerous if allowed to dictate or press comfortably.

selections.name: True Patriot
selections.reason: Speed figure of 114 is elite for this level. Consistent runner.

selections.name: Exington
selections.reason: Capable of hitting the board with a 103 speed figure.

danger_horse.name: Sakura Flavor (ire)
danger_horse.reason: High speed figure makes her a threat to steal it.

selections.name: Getaway Car
selections.reason: Baffert trainee with strong 3yo form. Speed 111. Should be primed for a big 4yo campaign.

selections.name: Bartholdy
selections.reason: Highest recent speed figure (115). Proven at the distance and class level.

selections.name: Midnight Mammoth
selections.reason: Grade 3 winner with back class. Speed 113 fits right in.

selections.name: Westwood
selections.reason: Shirreffs barn. Consistent 110 speed figures.

danger_horse.name: Bartholdy
danger_horse.reason: Very fast horse who could wire the field if Getaway Car falters.

selections.name: Mayacama
selections.reason: Consistent performer with 110 speed. Hernandez stays aboard. Should get a good stalking trip.

selections.name: She's A Joker
selections.reason: High speed figure (113). Miller/Jaramillo combo is dangerous.

selections.name: Nanci Griffith
selections.reason: Also possesses 113 speed. Miyadi barn is solid.

selections.name: Apple Pie
selections.reason: Value play with 111 speed figure. Drysdale/Berrios.

danger_horse.name: She's A Joker
danger_horse.reason: Speed figures indicate she is a major player.

selections.name: Captain Shreve
selections.reason: Ran a massive 112 speed figure in debut. With major scratches in the race, he becomes a standout.

selections.name: Potente
selections.reason: Baffert First Time Starter. Workouts look solid.

selections.name: Deep Tracks
selections.reason: Shirreffs First Time Starter. Watch the board.

selections.name: Cruisin For Cali
selections.reason: First timer, likely needs a race.

selections.name: Public Assembly
selections.reason: Consistent Graded Stakes performer. Speed 115. D'Amato/Berrios is a top turf combo.

selections.name: Vibez
selections.reason: Blistering speed (119). If she clears, she could be hard to catch.

selections.name: Will Then
selections.reason: Solid 112 speed figure. Consistent.

selections.name: My Perfect Wave
selections.reason: Improving type with 114 speed figure.

danger_horse.name: Vibez
danger_horse.reason: Highest speed figure in the race. Dangerous frontrunner.

selections.name: Cornucopian
selections.reason: Baffert runner with G1 placings. Speed 112. The class of the field.

selections.name: Simple Song
selections.reason: Fastest recent speed figure (116). Glatt/Kimura.

selections.name: See Through It
selections.reason: Veteran with 116 speed figure capability.

selections.name: Red Flag
selections.reason: Deep closer who will be picking up pieces.

danger_horse.name: Simple Song
danger_horse.reason: Has the raw speed to upset the favorite.

selections.name: Counterbalance
selections.reason: Two strong 2nd place finishes. Speed 105. McCarthy/Kimura.

selections.name: She's Limitless
selections.reason: Baffert First Time Starter. Must be respected.

selections.name: Mo Sasha
selections.reason: McCarthy/Hernandez First Time Starter. Look for market support.

selections.name: Getting Closer
selections.reason: Experience and 105 speed figure.
